title: Chat Lag
body:
My chat is lagging so hard when I load into champ select, in game it's allg, could it be the new client? 

Is anyone else experiencing this?

It's not my net!

replies.body:
Hey there,

What makes you so sure that it isnt your connection causing your issues?

* When you say the chat in champ select is "lagging" what exactly are you experiencing?
* Are you using a wired or a wireless connection?
  * Does switching to a wired connection help alleviate your issue?
